item.title: List of Music Production Courses & Reviews
item.description: Music Production Courses General Ask Video Ableton, Cubase, Logic Pro, Native Instruments … Born to Produce Groove3 Ableton, BitWig Studio, Cubase, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Maschine … macProVideo Point Blank Music School Steinberg Udemy Music Theory ThinkSpace Education General Composition Harmony One Harmony Two How To Write Music Learn Music Theory Piano Lessons Flowkey - practice notes and chords interactively and receive instant feedback Piano Genius - how to start playing your favorite songs now without the time and frustration of traditional lessons Piano University - become a piano superhuman Pianote - online piano lessons for all skill levels Skoove - complete online piano learning method YouTube Channels Mastering․com Mix with the Masters School of Synthesis Underdog Electronic Music School Music Production Reviews YouTube Channels Andrew Huang - Canadian YouTube personality, musician & video producer Andertons - music hardware & software reviews Doctor Mix - weekly reviews, tips & techniques on music production, mixing and mastering Guy Michelmore / ThinkSpace Education In The Mix - simplifying the recording, production, mixing and mastering process Jef Gibbons - video production, photography & music production Nu-Trix The Synth Guy - synthesizer reviews & music production Sanjay C - music production, gear & tips Simeon Amburgey - virtual instruments from developers all over the world Sound On Sound - recording & music technology magazine Venus Theory - music production & reviews Woody Piano Shack - music production & reviews Music Producers Glenn Main - Norwegian electronic music composer State Azure - electronic music producer from the UK Music Software & Plugin Deals Audio Plugin Guy
item.content:encoded:
Music Production Courses

General

  • Ask Video
    • Ableton, Cubase, Logic Pro, Native Instruments …
  • Born to Produce
  • Groove3
    • Ableton, BitWig Studio, Cubase, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Maschine …
  • macProVideo
  • Point Blank Music School
  • Steinberg
  • Udemy

Music Theory

  • ThinkSpace Education
    • General Composition
      • Harmony One
      • Harmony Two
      • How To Write Music
      • Learn Music Theory

Piano Lessons

  • Flowkey - practice notes and chords interactively and receive instant feedback
  • Piano Genius - how to start playing your favorite songs now without the time and frustration of traditional lessons
  • Piano University - become a piano superhuman
  • Pianote - online piano lessons for all skill levels
  • Skoove - complete online piano learning method

YouTube Channels

  • Mastering․com
  • Mix with the Masters
  • School of Synthesis
  • Underdog Electronic Music School

Music Production Reviews

YouTube Channels

  • Andrew Huang - Canadian YouTube personality, musician & video producer
  • Andertons - music hardware & software reviews
  • Doctor Mix - weekly reviews, tips & techniques on music production, mixing and mastering
  • Guy Michelmore / ThinkSpace Education
  • In The Mix - simplifying the recording, production, mixing and mastering process
  • Jef Gibbons - video production, photography & music production
  • Nu-Trix The Synth Guy - synthesizer reviews & music production
  • Sanjay C - music production, gear & tips
  • Simeon Amburgey - virtual instruments from developers all over the world
  • Sound On Sound - recording & music technology magazine
  • Venus Theory - music production & reviews
  • Woody Piano Shack - music production & reviews

Music Producers

  • Glenn Main - Norwegian electronic music composer
  • State Azure - electronic music producer from the UK

Music Software & Plugin Deals

  • Audio Plugin Guy
